content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: July 16, 2025

De-luxe Home is committed to protecting your privacy. We only collect personal information necessary to communicate with you, provide services, and improve your experience on our website.

What We Collect

  • Name, email, and phone number (if submitted through forms)
  • Project details you choose to share
  • Site usage data (via cookies and analytics tools)

How We Use Your Information

  • To respond to inquiries and service requests
  • To improve our website and customer experience
  • To send updates or promotions (if you opt in)

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal data. You can contact us at any time to request, update, or delete your information.

For questions or concerns, reach out to: info@de-luxe Home.com

original_content:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: July 16, 2025

De-luxe Home is committed to protecting your privacy. We only collect personal information necessary to communicate with you, provide services, and improve your experience on our website.

What We Collect

  • Name, email, and phone number (if submitted through forms)
  • Project details you choose to share
  • Site usage data (via cookies and analytics tools)

How We Use Your Information

  • To respond to inquiries and service requests
  • To improve our website and customer experience
  • To send updates or promotions (if you opt in)

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal data. You can contact us at any time to request, update, or delete your information.

For questions or concerns, reach out to: info@de-luxe Home.com
